plans.name: Student (6 months)
plans.description: Requires confirmed .edu email address. Check out up to 3 additional bikes at 12¢/minute using account number and PIN.

plans.name: Annual
plans.description: Discounts available for businesses and organizations. Check out up to 3 additional bikes at 12¢/minute with account number and PIN.

plans.name: Monthly Plan (3 month minimum)
plans.description: 3-month minimum. Auto renews monthly. Check out up to 3 additional bikes at 12¢/minute using account number and PIN.

plans.name: Monthly Plus (3 month minimum)
plans.description: 3-month minimum. Auto renews monthly. Check out up to 3 additional bikes at 12¢/minute using account number and PIN.

plans.name: Pay As You Go
plans.description: Minutes are purchased in advance and balance of available time is reduced when used, with no expiration. Check out up to 4 bikes at a time at 12¢/minute using your account number and PIN.

plans.name: 7-Day Pass (180 free minutes)
plans.description: Activates upon purchase. Includes 180 minutes of free usage. Check out up to 3 additional bikes at 12¢/minute using account number and PIN. No credit or refund for unused minutes.
